info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued June 26 at 4:33AM EDT until June 28 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Dangerous swimming conditions are expected. Waves of 2 to 3 feet will build to 3 to 4 feet this afternoon. Moderate to strong rip and structural currents are expected this afternoon and evening. Life-threatening conditions are expected later tonight into Tuesday night, with waves building to 5 to 8 feet. Strong rip, structural, and longshore currents are expected. Piers will be heavily swamped by waves Tonight into Tuesday night. * WHERE...Northern Berrien county. * WHEN...From 2 PM EDT this afternoon through late Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Strong currents can pull swimmers into deeper water and high waves can sweep people off piers.
info.instruction: Remain out of the water to avoid hazardous swimming conditions. Do not venture out on piers.
